db.description:
As a shop manager your job will be to lead a team to serve nutritious smoothies, juices, and salads with exceptional customer service. 

You will be expected to:
-Ensure excellent product and service level
-Consult customers on product nutrition and customization for smoothies, juices, and superfoods 
-Supervise, train, and evaluate team members
-Resolve customer issues
-Carry out company procedures and guidelines
-Ensure high level cleanliness and sanitation
-Manage inventory and cost controls efficiently
-Maintain good communication and reporting with administration
db.requirement: -English is required\r\n-1-3 years in management level F&B, retail, or hospitality\r\n-Basic computer proficiency

more.requirement: -English is required -1-3 years in management level F&B, retail, or hospitality -Basic computer proficiency
more.description:
As a shop manager your job will be to lead a team to serve nutritious smoothies, juices, and salads with exceptional customer service.
You will be expected to: -Ensure excellent product and service level -Consult customers on product nutrition and customization for smoothies, juices, and superfoods -Supervise, train, and evaluate team members -Resolve customer issues -Carry out company procedures and guidelines -Ensure high level cleanliness and sanitation -Manage inventory and cost controls efficiently -Maintain good communication and reporting with administration
